resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158048</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158048</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3346</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teaching - in Six Words</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichten - in sechs Wörtern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enseignement - dans six mots</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ensinar - em seis palavras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insegnando - in sei parole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διδασκαλία - σε έξι λέξεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enseñanza - en seis palabras</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The ETNI RAG" asked teachers to describe what it means to be a teacher in only 6 words. As you can see below, use of a limited number of words illuminated the different aspects of teaching in an amazing way</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teacher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teaching</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der ETNI LAPPEN "bat Lehrer, zu beschreiben, was 
er bedeutet, ein Lehrer in nur 6 Wörtern zu sein. Wie Sie unten
sehen können, belichtete Gebrauch von einer begrenzten Anzahl von 
Wörtern die unterschiedlichen Aspekte des Unterrichtens in einer 
erstaunlichen Methode</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le CHIFFON d'ETNI "a demandé à des professeurs 
de décrire ce que signifie il pour être un professeur dans seulement
6 mots. Comme vous pouvez voir ci-dessous, l'utilisation d'un 
nombre limité de mots a illuminé les différents aspects de 
l'enseignement d'une voie étonnante</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O PANO de ETNI "pediu que os professores 
descrevessem o que significa ser um professor em somente 6 palavras. 
Como você pode ver abaixo, o uso de um número limitado das 
palavras iluminou os aspectos diferentes de ensinar em uma maneira 
surpreendente</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il PANNO di ETNI "ha chiesto agli insegnanti di 
descrivere che cosa significa essere un insegnante in soltanto 6 
parole. Come potete vedere sotto, l'uso di un numero limitato di
parole ha illuminato le funzioni differenti di istruzione in un modo 
stupefacente</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ΚΟΥΡΈΛΙ ETNI "ζήτησε από τους δασκάλους για να 
περιγράψει τι σημαίνει για να είναι δάσκαλος σε μόνο 6 λέξεις. 
Όπως μπορείτε να δείτε κατωτέρω, η χρήση ενός 
περιορισμένου αριθμού λέξεων φώτισε τις διαφορετικές πτυχές της 
διδασκαλίας με έναν καταπληκτικό τρόπο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El TRAPO de ETNI "pidió que los profesores 
describieran lo que significa ser profesor en solamente 6 palabras. 
Como usted puede ver abajo, el uso de un número limitado de 
palabras iluminó los diversos aspectos de la enseñanza de una manera
asombrosa</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterricht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">professeur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enseignement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">professor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ensino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">insegnante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">insegnamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δάσκαλος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διδασκαλία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">profesor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">enseñanza</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
